messages.content: I’m super excited and waiting for the FOV slider to put on the live server.
That and losing [NAME]. The two of them had instant chemistry. Excited to see is he can become a big part of our offense next year.
So... she just won the lottery!!
Nobel prize, u/Otomyre, Nobel prize! I’ll see you in Sweden!
oh cool! Must be tiring for [NAME] though. Looking forward to watching them!
Happy Birthday [NAME]. You wont read this message but itll be here.
Doubters. I'm still waiting on a status report of the 2 fluffers from a few weeks ago. WOOF!
It's MLK Day so we're offering our best deals on our Ford F250s!
Oooh. Look! Big man over here!
cant wait to go through a rebranded version of this pain again in college too
So word is we have eyes on [NAME]... I would be pretty amped to see him with a Jet on his shirt.
Excitement for new regulation and taxation in the ancap reddit?!?
*Hey just noticed..* it's your **1st Cakeday** Spottedgriffin! ^(hug)
I'm more interested in why there are goldfish in the picture...
Can holiday just stop fucking shooting? I can’t wait till he gets traded.
2 more trae assists pls another 3 would be delightful as well
I’m gonna need to see that in writing before I celebrate.
It’s time for some moderator field work!
I will then be singing "The hills are alive with the sound of music."
